_header: All the way that God goth by
_description: God’s mercy — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notes translating ‘Omnes vie Domini tue misericoridia et veritas‘ (Tobias 3:2) which precedes it

NLS18721.Transcription:
Al þe wey þat god goth by[I]s sothfastnesse &
                    mercy
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 64.
